Smarter, faster and without limits
hero.subtitle: Oxide Lab — cutting-edge AI algorithms right on your computer. Advanced generation without repetition, auto-tuning to your hardware, instant model loading with progress. Free, open, completely yours

features.title:
Everything you need from modern AI
In one app, on your computer
features.subtitle: Oxide Lab combines the best local AI technologies: support for popular models, quality generation without artifacts, optimization for any hardware

qwen3.title: Qwen3 GGUF Support
qwen3.description: Harness the power of cutting-edge language models running locally for unparalleled performance and efficiency

cleanText.title: Clean text without artifacts
cleanText.description: No '�' characters in text — the app properly assembles characters in parts, so you see clean text even with emojis

smartGeneration.title: Smart generation without repetition
smartGeneration.description: Special algorithm ensures AI doesn't get stuck on the same phrases, making responses more natural

fastDialogs.title: Fast work with long dialogues
fastDialogs.description: The app remembers conversation context without slowdown, even if the conversation lasts several hours

autoHardware.title: Automatically adapts to your hardware
autoHardware.description: The app automatically determines whether to use GPU or CPU for maximum speed

progressTracking.title: Detailed loading progress
progressTracking.description: See exact model loading percentage and can cancel at any time if you change your mind

memoryModes.title: Three memory saving modes
memoryModes.description: Choose between speed (Default), memory efficiency (MemoryEfficient) or maximum precision (MaximumPrecision). Works only with Safetensors without quantization

chatTemplates.title: Chat templates compatibility
chatTemplates.description: Automatically uses the correct prompt format for each model, and if something goes wrong — switches to backup mode

deviceSwitching.title: CPU/GPU switching on the fly
deviceSwitching.description: You can instantly switch between CPU and GPU without restarting the program

rustPerformance.title: Efficient memory usage
rustPerformance.description: Written in Rust instead of Electron, so it doesn't slow down the system like other apps

candleML.title: Modern ML framework
candleML.description: Uses Candle ML framework with CUDA and Metal support for maximum speed

contextManagement.title: Smart context management
contextManagement.description: Automatically trims overly long prompts and shows how many tokens are being used

crashProtection.title: Crash protection
crashProtection.description: If something goes wrong with the model format, the app automatically switches to backup mode

fileProtection.title: File size control
fileProtection.description: Protection against accidentally loading huge files (20MB limit per document)

operationCancel.title: Full operation cancellation
operationCancel.description: You can stop model loading or text generation at any time

thinkingDemo.title: Watch it think in real-time
thinkingDemo.subtitle: Our interactive demo showcases the AI's reasoning process with elegant thought animations. Enter a phrase and watch Oxide Lab complete your thought

minimal.title: Minimum requirements:
minimal.cpu: CPU: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3 or equivalent
minimal.gpu: GPU: Integrated graphics (runs on CPU) or NVIDIA GTX 1060 (3 GB VRAM) and higher

recommended.title: Recommended requirements:
recommended.cpu: CPU: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 (6+ cores)
recommended.gpu: GPU: NVIDIA GTX 1070 (8 GB VRAM) and higher
recommended.ssd: Drive: SSD for fast model loading
